fanxchange.description: Consumer site for Fanxchange's live-event marketplace.

unity-mesh-slicer.description: Real-time 3D geometry bisection. Works with both convex and non-convex geometries.

projects.name: Strange Dungeon - Computechnosoft
projects.description: Video game currently being pitched to publishers.
achievements: Refactored core combat system to resolve major deficiencies.
Rebuilt UI system to improve flexibility for artists and robustness across target devices.

projects.name: Areto Analyzer - Areto Labs
projects.description: AI powered tool for tracking, tracing, and counteracting online abuse.
achievements: Worked with engineering and leadership to identify and resolve major sources of development friction and service instability.
Lead several major overhauls including a robust CI/CD pipeline, and customer-facing site.

projects.name: RobotsMakeTV
projects.description: Show with a 3-way authorship dynamic between a director, AI, and a live audience.
achievements: Designed and developed a sophisticated system for running a real-time generative TV show.
Built custom tools for content creators to produce their own narrative structures powered by machine intelligence.
Supported a weekly live-stream on Twitch with guest directors and direct audience control.

projects.name: Asset Graph
projects.description: System for building a searchable graph of files to be used in ML training pipelines.
achievements: Architected a modular system with extension points for expanding supported file types and relational mapping techniques.
Facilitated the processing of 400k+ assets spanning over 10 years of production for a notable animated YouTube series.
Acted as the primary point of contact for clients throughout planning, development, and delivery.
Ensured deliverable was compliant with software licenses and helped define an appropriate commercial license for clients.

projects.name: AI Music Blocks
projects.description: No-code tool for composing ML music blocks to form dynamic soundscapes.
achievements: Architected a real-time music generation system which enabled experimentation and play.
Created a custom node-graph web interface for configuring and connecting AI music blocks.
Worked closely with accomplished musicians/producers to shape the project.

projects.name: Venue Maps
projects.description: Interactive 3D map for finding the best seats at your next live event.
achievements: Protoyped and deployed an end-to-end solution for industry-leading live-event venue maps.
Sparked interest with a competitor which led to an acquisition.
Led migration of venue map data and related software from Fanxchange to Vivid Seats.
Worked with content team to optimize the workflow for producing/managing maps at scale.
Conducted ETL on thousands of venue maps from three large data acquisitions.

projects.name: Live Event Marketplace
projects.description: Marketplace for purchasing tickets to live events across North-America.
achievements: Worked closely with design team to rebuild and modernize fanxchange.com.
Designed and built a solution for deploying customized live-event marketplaces for B2B clients.
Created a 360Â°, gyroscope-enabled, "View from Your Seat" feature for mobile shoppers.
